ComicInfo.Title: Worlds at War!
ComicInfo.Summary: Worlds at War!: The Silent One leads Thor to Hela, who tries to kill Thor, but The Silent One gives his life to save Thor. Odin battles Infinity.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:22:27. [Issue ID 24109]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Odin's Vizier,Thor,Sif,Heimdall,Volstagg],The Silent One (death),Fandral,The Guardian,Warriors Three [Hogun,Don Blake,Hela,Infinity,Odin,Balder
